verses.verse: Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H935><s%> in and told <S%H5046><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "My father and my brothers <S%H1><s%> and their flocks <S%H251><s%> and their herds <S%H6629><s%> and all <S%H1241><s%> that they have, have come <S%H3605><s%> out of the land <S%H935><s%> of Canaan; <S%H776><s%> and behold, <S%H3667><s%> they are in the land <S%H2009><s%> of Goshen. <S%H776><s%>"
And he took <S%H3947><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> men <S%H376><s%> from among <S%H7097><s%> his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and presented <S%H3322><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them to Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> is your occupation <S%H4639><s%>?" So they said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "Your servants <S%H5650><s%> are shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> we and our fathers."

And they said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "We have come <S%H935><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> for there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%> for your servants <S%H5650><s%>' flocks, <S%H6629><s%> for the famine <S%H7458><s%> is severe <S%H3515><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%> Now, <S%H6258><s%> therefore, please <S%H4994><s%> let your servants live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen. <S%H1657><s%>"
Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "Your father and your brothers <S%H1><s%> have come <S%H251><s%> to you.

"The land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> is at your disposal; <S%H6440><s%> settle <S%H3427><s%> your father and your brothers <S%H1><s%> in the best <S%H251><s%> of the land, <S%H4315><s%> let them live <S%H776><s%> in the land <S%H3427><s%> of Goshen; <S%H776><s%> and if <S%H1657><s%> you know <S%H518><s%> any <S%H3045><s%> capable <S%H3426><s%> men <S%H2428><s%> among them, then put <S%H376><s%> them in charge <S%H7760><s%> of my livestock. <S%H8269><s%>"

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> his father Jacob <S%H1><s%> and presented <S%H3290><s%> <S%H5975><s%> him to Pharaoh; <S%H6440><s%> and Jacob <S%H6547><s%> blessed <S%H3290><s%> Pharaoh. <S%H1288><s%>
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "How <S%H4100><s%> many <S%H4100><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> have you lived <S%H9132><s%>?"

So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "The years <S%H8141><s%> of my sojourning <S%H4033><s%> are one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty; <S%H7970><s%> few <S%H4592><s%> and unpleasant <S%H7451><s%> have been <S%H1961><s%> the years <S%H8141><s%> of my life, <S%H9132><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> have they attained <S%H5381><s%> the years <S%H8141><s%> that my fathers lived <S%H1><s%> during the days <S%H9132><s%> of their sojourning. <S%H3117><s%>"
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> out from his presence. <S%H6440><s%>

So Joseph <S%H3130><s%> settled <S%H3427><s%> his father and his brothers, <S%H1><s%> and gave <S%H251><s%> them a possession <S%H5414><s%> in the land <S%H272><s%> of Egypt, <S%H776><s%> in the best <S%H4714><s%> of the land, <S%H4315><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Rameses, <S%H776><s%> as Pharaoh <S%H7486><s%> had ordered. <S%H6547><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> provided <S%H3557><s%> his father and his brothers <S%H1><s%> and all <S%H251><s%> his father's household <S%H3605><s%> with food, <S%H1004><s%> according <S%H3899><s%> to their little <S%H6310><s%> ones. <S%H2945><s%>

Now there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the famine <S%H7458><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> severe, <S%H3515><s%> so that the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> languished <S%H3856><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the famine. <S%H7458><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gathered <S%H3950><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> that was found <S%H4672><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> for the grain <S%H7668><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they bought, <S%H7666><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> into Pharaoh's house. <S%H1004><s%>

And when the money <S%H3701><s%> was all <S%H8552><s%> spent <S%H8552><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H3051><s%> us food, <S%H3899><s%> for why <S%H4100><s%> should we die <S%H4191><s%> in your presence <S%H5048><s%>? For [our] money <S%H3701><s%> is gone. <S%H656><s%>"

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H3051><s%> up your livestock, <S%H4735><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you [food] for your livestock, <S%H4735><s%> since <S%H518><s%> [your] money <S%H3701><s%> is gone. <S%H656><s%>"

So they brought <S%H935><s%> their livestock <S%H4735><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them food <S%H3899><s%> in exchange for the horses <S%H5483><s%> and the flocks <S%H6629><s%> and the herds <S%H1241><s%> and the donkeys; <S%H2543><s%> and he fed <S%H5095><s%> them with food <S%H3899><s%> in exchange for all <S%H3605><s%> their livestock <S%H4735><s%> that year. <S%H8141><s%>

And when that year <S%H8141><s%> was ended, <S%H8552><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> to him the next <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "We will not hide <S%H3582><s%> from my lord <S%H113><s%> that our money <S%H3701><s%> is all <S%H8552><s%> spent, <S%H8552><s%> and the cattle <S%H4735><s%> <S%H929><s%> are my lord <S%H113><s%>'s. There is nothing <S%H3808><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> for my lord except <S%H1115><s%> <S%H518><s%> our bodies <S%H1472><s%> and our lands. <S%H127><s%>

"Why <S%H4100><s%> should we die <S%H4191><s%> before your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> we and our land <S%H127><s%>? Buy <S%H7069><s%> us and our land <S%H127><s%> for food, <S%H3899><s%> and we and our land <S%H127><s%> will be slaves <S%H5650><s%> to Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%> So give <S%H5414><s%> us seed, <S%H2233><s%> that we may live <S%H2421><s%> and not die, <S%H4191><s%> and that the land <S%H127><s%> may not be desolate. <S%H3456><s%>"

So Joseph <S%H3130><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> for every <S%H376><s%> Egyptian <S%H4714><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> his field, <S%H7704><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the famine <S%H7458><s%> was severe <S%H2388><s%> upon them. Thus the land <S%H776><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> Pharaoh's.
And as for the people, <S%H5971><s%> he removed <S%H5674><s%> them to the cities <S%H5892><s%> from one end <S%H7097><s%> of Egypt's border <S%H1366><s%> to the other. <S%H7097><s%>

Only <S%H7534><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> he did not buy, <S%H7069><s%> for the priests <S%H3548><s%> had an allotment <S%H2706><s%> from Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and they lived <S%H398><s%> off <S%H398><s%> the allotment <S%H2706><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them. Therefore, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they did not sell <S%H4376><s%> their land. <S%H127><s%>

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I have today <S%H3117><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> you and your land <S%H127><s%> for Pharaoh; <S%H6547><s%> now, <S%H1887><s%> [here] is seed <S%H2233><s%> for you, and you may sow <S%H2232><s%> the land. <S%H127><s%>

"And at the harvest <S%H8393><s%> you shall give <S%H5414><s%> a fifth <S%H2549><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and four-fifths shall be your own for seed <S%H2233><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> and for your food <S%H400><s%> and for those of your households <S%H1004><s%> and as food <S%H398><s%> for your little <S%H2945><s%> ones. <S%H2945><s%>"

So they said, <S%H559><s%> "You have saved <S%H2421><s%> our lives! <S%H2421><s%> Let us find <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of my lord, <S%H113><s%> and we will be Pharaoh's slaves. <S%H5650><s%>"

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> made <S%H7760><s%> it a statute <S%H2706><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> [valid] to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> should have the fifth; <S%H2569><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> did not become <S%H1961><s%> Pharaoh's.

Now Israel <S%H3478><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> in Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> and they acquired <S%H270><s%> property <S%H270><s%> in it and were fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and became <S%H7235><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> numerous. <S%H7235><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> seventeen <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> so the length <S%H3117><s%> of Jacob's life <S%H9132><s%> was one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and forty-seven years. <S%H8141><s%>

When the time <S%H3117><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%> to die <S%H4191><s%> drew <S%H7126><s%> near, <S%H7126><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Please, <S%H4994><s%> if <S%H518><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> place <S%H7760><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> my thigh <S%H3409><s%> and deal <S%H6213><s%> with me in kindness <S%H2617><s%> and faithfulness. <S%H571><s%> Please <S%H4994><s%> do not bury <S%H6912><s%> me in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>

but when I lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> with my fathers, you shall carry <S%H1><s%> me out of Egypt <S%H5375><s%> and bury <S%H4714><s%> me in their burial <S%H6912><s%> place. <S%H6900><s%> "And he said, <S%H6900><s%> "I will do <S%H559><s%> as you have said. <S%H6213><s%> "
And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Swear <S%H7650><s%> to me." So he swore <S%H7650><s%> to him. Then Israel <S%H3478><s%> bowed <S%H7812><s%> [in worship] at the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bed. <S%H4296><s%>
